name: Kiri
description: For parents with young children whom they want to learn a second language, our smart toy provides a multisensory learning experience that teaches kids English, Mandarin and Spanish through play. We teach 46 subjects in all 3 languages.
one_liner: For parents with young children whom they want to learn a second language, our smart toy provides a multisensory learning experience that teaches kids English, Mandarin and Spanish through play. We teach 46 subjects in all 3 languages.
